title: Comedy Central Backs New 'Daily Show' Host Despite Insensitive Tweets
teaser: Comedy Central named Trevor Noah on Monday to replace Jon Stewart as host of The Daily Show. The 31-year-old comic is being criticized for misogynistic and anti-Semitic jokes tweeted in 2009.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
